dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset contains 70,000 28Ã—28 one-channel gray images of handwritten digits from zero to nine, with 60,000 images for training and 10,000 for testing.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: R. Gary Leonard
George Doddington
dcterms:description: The TIDigits dataset contains 4,144 spoken digit recordings from zero to nine, corresponding to the digits in the MNIST dataset, with each recording sampled at 20KHz for around 1 second.
dcterms:title: TIDigits
